Bug report.Label: Name
Bug report.Value: Items color differ from the selected one

Bug report.Label: Summary
Bug report.Value: Selected item color does not match the one selected in color picker field

Bug report.Value: Uploaded on the right side of report table

Bug report.Label: Steps to reproduce
Expected result
Bug report.Value: Model with grey fitess shirt on should be displayed

Bug report.Label: Actual result
Bug report.Value: Model with blue fitess shirt on is displayed

Bug report.Label: Notes
Bug report.Value: This very same bug is present amongs a lot of items within the App

Summary.SUMMARY: demo web application for ordering goods.
·         App is very user friendly and easy to operate
·         All basic functions are working as per expected
·         All of the links in the footer are clickable, also all images are clickable
·         Response time of App is positive
·         Bug report – only single bug is reported since this same issue reported was found in many items in the app
·         Issues are not critical, application is usable
·         Since this is a demo version, no credit card can be added, so bug is not reported
·         Add/Delete to Cart functions are working as per expected
·         Application is functional on both environment tested – Windows & Android
